title: Taking care of yourself: breast self-examination
creator_credit: New South Wales Cancer Council, Westmead Hospital and Instant Replay Productions
brief_description: Most women take care of their bodies, however very few of them check their breasts as often as they should. This program explains the importance of regular breast self-examination, and provides a step-by-step guide for carrying out effective examinations. It also provides guidelines on what to look out for when carrying out breast self-examination.
